author: bushwhacker2k

text:
This is easily the finest game that was released on the SNES. It's a crying shame that it didn't make it stateside. As far as I know; the game never made it to the states for two reasons. 
1: the game was so frikken massive that they couldn't fit all of the hardware into a North American cart, and 
2: Because the U.S got the mediocre Secret of Evermore.

This is one of the unspoken greats of video gaming.
